explains: v. （使）不稳而倒下，（使）倒塌；推翻（首领），颠覆（政权）；<美>战胜，打败

sentences.en: The tree is so badly damaged they are worried it might topple over.
sentences.cn: 这棵树损伤非常严重以至于他们担心它会倒下。

sentences.en: So, why don’t they topple over at the first tremor?
sentences.cn: 那么，为什么它们在首次抖动时不倒塌？

sentences.en: One good blow would topple him over and down and out.
sentences.cn: 只要好好的一拳，就能把他打倒，叫他完蛋。
